svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.1.2 Chrome/138.0.7204.243 Electron/37.4.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.2"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="JrFknHJHxVdyT8_KWAcq"> <mxGraphModel dx="1112" dy="365" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="3s4cD8Fam__VJ9MO_Zjl-4" value="<font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">Isn't there a bank anywhere in town?</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" width="255" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zZ570xTJSwxiv8Kvg7Ka-2" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">THere isn't, // CUriously</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="30" width="165" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uaw-aOKHzE1apjnC2yEl-4" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uaw-aOKHzE1apjnC2yEl-5" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">B:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="30" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="P7aRpOCLzwWemmQJCaz--4" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">A:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="70" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="P7aRpOCLzwWemmQJCaz--5" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">How did the exam go?</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="70" width="155" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-4" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="125" y="100" width="40" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-8" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">//.</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="30" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-10" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">当curiously位于句末时，通常是升调</font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="235" y="20" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-11" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="235" y="40" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="205" y="40" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-12" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><font face="Tahoma" style="font-size: 15px;">B:</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="100" width="25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-13" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">// On the WHOLE</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-5" y="100" width="125" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-15" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="125" y="100" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="145" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-16" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">// it went very well.</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="165" y="100" width="140" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-17" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330" y="110" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="300" y="110" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-18" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">当on the whole位于句首时，通常是先降调再升调</font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="90" width="175" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="165" y="30" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ni2wJ_wEPbVBkaOW3s29-6" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="165" y="50" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="185" y="30" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-2" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="145" y="120" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="165" y="100" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-3" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">Our maths teacher's not the happiest of people // to say the LEAST</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-25" y="140" width="455" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-5" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="435" y="140" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-6" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="435" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="455" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-7" value="<font face="Tahoma"><span style="font-size: 15px;">//.</span></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="455" y="140" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-8" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="370" y="190" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="370" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WzBTNI2syYYhSJHJ0KC_-9" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">当to say the least位于句末时，通常是降调</font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="295" y="190" width="150" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
